title: Introduction to Binary Patching in Cybersecurity and Reverse Engineering
excerpt: Learn about binary patching, a powerful technique used in cybersecurity for modifying compiled programs without source code access.
author: Pancham Narang

title: Understanding UAF: A Practical Guide to Safer Memory Management
excerpt: Dive into Use-After-Free vulnerabilities, understand how they work, and learn best practices for safer memory management in your code.
author: Pancham Narang

title: Understanding YARA Rules: The Detective Tool for Catching Malware
excerpt: Learn about YARA rules, a powerful tool used by malware researchers to identify and classify malicious software through pattern matching.
author: Pancham Narang

title: Code Obfuscation Techniques in Reverse Engineering
excerpt: Learn about code obfuscation techniques used to protect software from reverse engineering and how attackers bypass these protections.
author: Pancham Narang
